com.xiaosfx.annotation

Annotation Type XContainer


  • @Target(value={TYPE,FIELD})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface XContainer
    All the classes that are going to use XLayout and all the containers inside of it
    should have this annotation.

    When using on a container, you need to set it's layout to null, and also remember
    to set it's name, because by default it's value = "",
    this should be done to avoid "conflict" between the class container and this container,
    unless you've changed the class container's name.

    Note: The names are Case-Sensitive.

    Visit: http://www.xiaosfx.com for more informations.
    Version:
    1.0 - October 11, 2012
    Author:
    Alex Sam Lou

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String name
      Each container has it's own name, which are used to identify which components belongs to which container.
      If by chance two or more container holds the same name, it may cause an unexpected layout result and possible errors.
      int paddingBottom 
      int paddingLeft 
      int paddingRight 
      int paddingTop 

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        Each container has it's own name, which are used to identify which components belongs to which container.
        If by chance two or more container holds the same name, it may cause an unexpected layout result and possible errors.

        Note: The names are Case-Sensitive.

        Returns:
        The name of this container
        Default:
        ""

      • paddingBottom

        public abstract int paddingBottom
        Returns:
        The bottom padding of this container.
        Default:
        0

      • paddingLeft

        public abstract int paddingLeft
        Returns:
        The left padding of this container.
        Default:
        0

      • paddingRight

        public abstract int paddingRight
        Returns:
        The right padding of this container.
        Default:
        0

      • paddingTop

        public abstract int paddingTop
        Returns:
        The top padding of this container.
        Default:
        0
